page.title: 06HOUSING_LOCAL DEVELOPMENT
page.content: The small hamlet of Platt's Heath lies in the S.E. corner of the block and is typically an area of slow but steady development. The amount of land available for development is limited and large housing estates are not possible. The route of the projected M20 motorway runs a quarter of a mile to the S.E. and until this has been constructed no development is likely between here and Sandway hamlet. All development has been residential and no community projects such as a new village hall are envisaged at present. The original old houses have very largely been renovated and yet have not lost their charm and mingle with much newer houses in a very natural and unobtrusive manner.
